website_summaries.verdict: A good-looking – and sounding – four-pack of brass cymbals with an excellent price point, perfect for beginning drummers.
pros: Cymbals are solidly built and fill out a basic drum kit nicely
Hi-hat provides crisp tone, with many users praising their performance as worthy of more expensive brands
Can be used for multiple styles of music
cons: Set does not come with a carrying bag or felts
Some users find the sound a bit too metallic

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for our house kit, the top hat is excellent, feels really bouncy and crisp. The ride has good resonance and the crash is pretty loud. A different sound than what I was expecting but its much better than our old cymbal. For the price I don't think anything beats it. Great for our Pearl Roadshow kit and sure to last us years down the road. I bought the square trade protection plan as well just in case, haven't had any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Mac Myers

customer_reviews.title: Best for the price....wow. I'm impressed.
customer_reviews.text: For your money......Wow. I thought they were going to bend and dent up. I lost all my metal moving to Arizona.....needed cheap cymbals.....I can't believe how good these sound. I play a pocket jazz kit and the tone is higher than I thought it was going to be. $200????? Nuts, man. When I get a new set, I'll keep the ride....it has a few nice sounds.
customer_reviews.author: Coolest Cutter At Camp

customer_reviews.title: why I got these.
customer_reviews.text: Uh... Hell yea. I bought a 5 piece drum kit for $599 which included the bass drum, the 2 toms, floor tom, and snare. I then went out and got the Pearl hardware for roughly $200 (included 2 cymbal stands, hi hat stand, snare stand, and bass drum kick pedal) topping it all off with 3pack of Sabian cymbals for just under $200. I bought other things but it's roughly $1000 to complete this kit. now I want to go out and get the 18"
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Clemons

customer_reviews.title: Great entry level set
customer_reviews.text: These are not top of the line cymbals. They also don't cost thousands of dollars. For an entry level set, they have a nice sound, seem to be reasonably durable, and give you enough to fill a basic kit and feel like you're playing music. Is there an upgrade in my future? Most likely. These should do the trick for a good while before then.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: New life for my drum
customer_reviews.text: Great price for such professional product. The sounds are sharp and genuine. My original drum set cymbols were kind of cheap. This new set bring life out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Tribe

customer_reviews.title: These cymbals look and sound great! They seem to be well-made and hopefully should ...
customer_reviews.text: These cymbals look and sound great! They seem to be well-made and hopefully should last a while. Would recommend them based on the limited use so far. Long term durability is unknown at this point.
customer_reviews.author: G. Basarkar

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: As you should expect, the tone of these cymbals is fairly harsh and metallic with the ride cymbal being the best of the set. This is a good choice for a beginner, though, and would also be appropriate for a hobbyist or garage band.
customer_reviews.author: n.atha.n

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set of cymbals because they were the cheap and I just wanted something to bang on to practice. For that reason, they get three stars. Unfortunately, they sound terrible, have little dynamics, and don't bounce well. I was especially disappointed in the high hats, which have a distracting high-pitch overtone. Being a rock drummer this is a deal breaker as they're a big part of the performance. Next time I would consider trying to find used cymbals or purchase one at a time of a little higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: the green end

customer_reviews.title: For the price, I can't argue
customer_reviews.text: These sound fine for the price. I think they sound a bit tinney, but that's to be expected at this price margin. Also my practice space has mediocre acoustics so I'm sure that's part of it. They came packaged nicely and in perfect condition. I'm happy! But not 5 stars because I was just hoping they'd sound a little better. All in all, would recommend to anyone trying to budget their drum set, just want to play, and aren't audiophiles when it comes to their set. I play punk, metal and post-rock so these are perfect for me. However if you are a jazz musician or recording hi-fidelity sound, you may want to drop another $100-$200 on a nicer set.
customer_reviews.author: Matao I.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: These were ordered as a christmas gift so I haven't been able to see them in actual use yet. But they came quickly and with all parts included. They appear to be made of good material and strong. I will update my review if anything changes after they are put to use.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Perfect upgrade for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is more than happy. She just replaced the original cymbals in her drums set and now she performs full and rich sound.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: i love it
customer_reviews.text: these cymbals are considered low budget to most people compared to the B8 line. but i think these sound awesome in my own opinion. id give them an 8/10 on the sound for the price :)
customer_reviews.author: drummerman911

customer_reviews.title: Nice upgrade
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to upgrade the cymbals that came with my sunlight drum set that I've had for a few years. These cymbals are a great entry cymbal. I'd recommend them to anyone looking to upgrade from the cheap symbols on a entry level kit.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Grose Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: I bought these about 5 years ago and they still sound great. Ive hardly used them though..
customer_reviews.author: jetoperator

customer_reviews.title: Cool ride
customer_reviews.text: Hi hats barley pass in my world, crash was horrible. Ride is amazing but the crash is trash and the hi hats are alright recommend thjs for begginers only!!!! If u are a intermiedate or advanced drummer, buy the sabian AAX dont recommend getting zildjian unless there are custom k
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: Great, inexpensive cymbal set.
customer_reviews.text: My Zildjians are in another state, for the time being. I was pleasantly surprised at how good these brass cymbals sound, especially for the price. I saw a few comments about the 16" crash cymbal- to me it seems more like a thin ride/ medium crash weight, but i think it sounds okay. It's the weak link, but it isn't bad at all.
customer_reviews.author: endsng

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy if your on a budget.
customer_reviews.text: The cymbal packaging was pretty solid. But the box looked like it had been opened before which I mean I didn't have a problem with it the cymbals looked unused besides a small scratch on the bottom of the ride. Once I hooked the cymbals to my set I was not a huge fan of the crash and the ride bell. But besides that they were pretty good and the crash cymbal grew on me more and more I played.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Blake

customer_reviews.title: Good cymbals.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good entry level set. The sounds they produce are acceptable. The 16" crash is the one I sort of dislike but I've heard others worse than this (that's why I didn't give the fith star). I consider that it is a good set for the money you pay for it.
customer_reviews.author: JLEMUS

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: These cymbals are not very crisp. I wouldn't purchase them agian if I could look back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This performance Pack Performs
customer_reviews.text: The Sabian has been my favorite for a long time because they can give the drummer any sound they need when hit.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Colby

customer_reviews.title: Happy drummer!
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great. Arrived in two days. Couldn't have got a better price anywhere. $166 for the set. Extremely happy.
customer_reviews.author: Todd W.

customer_reviews.title: Good Cymbals
customer_reviews.text: Nice enough for my beginning son..bought with Pearl drums..he is 15 years old and loves the cymbals, drums and seat so it was worth it. He didn't expect such a nice set.
customer_reviews.author: J. B. King

customer_reviews.title: Great BANG for your buck
customer_reviews.text: I picked these up instead of the Zilgians just because of price. These Sabians have not disappointed whatsoever. The only issue I have is that the high hats were the same 14" cymbal for both the top and bottom hat. Ive read that the bottom cymbal is supposed to be a little heavier but that is not the case with this set. Mine are not labeled top or bottom so I assume I have 2 of the same cymbals.
customer_reviews.author: Merlin

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Don't sound all that great. But I guess you get what you pay for. Good Cymbals are expensive
customer_reviews.author: Dakota Sottosanto

customer_reviews.title: Nice price, love them!
customer_reviews.text: Nice sound and price for beginners...don't have any experience with pro level gear, but they're great as far as I'm concerned!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Great improvement over original cymbal set
customer_reviews.text: Great improvement over original cymbal set. Sounds great, good value for price. Will likely upgrade further later but this is all an emerging drummer needs for now.
customer_reviews.author: Zippy Riffs

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good as starter pack for a beginner as I am.
customer_reviews.author: Mefistofelerion

customer_reviews.title: For the price these are great for learning/practicing
customer_reviews.text: I am by no means a professional drummer. I purchased these cymbals for me to mess around and make some noise in my garage a few hours/few days a week. For the price these are great for learning/practicing. I would definitely recommend these for someone starting out or just messing around and those who don't want to break the bank.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Farley

customer_reviews.title: Good Starter Set
customer_reviews.text: Not the sound I was looking for but cannot complain for the price. Excellent set for a beginning drummer.
customer_reviews.author: TIM WYROBECK

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cymbals for an excellent price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cymbals for an excellent price. My daughter love these cymbals. These cymbals have a beautiful sound and are very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: columbus tillman

customer_reviews.title: Great starter pack
customer_reviews.text: The hats and ride sound great but the splash is a little lacking
customer_reviews.author: Damion

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sounding starter set for my grandson to bang away on
customer_reviews.author: Mike Beckman

customer_reviews.title: Good value and quality
customer_reviews.text: Looked around for the best quality at an affordable price point and settled on this set. 1 month in and they're sounding great.
customer_reviews.author: L. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Good, good, goood.
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery. Very good sound. Price nobody can offer better. Ivo Botica Split Croatia
customer_reviews.author: Ivo

customer_reviews.title: ride sounds excellent to me
customer_reviews.text: Works very well for beginner cymbals, ride sounds excellent to me, hi-hat could be better, but it's a great set for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Tom Jeske

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product at a very good price! It was better than what I expected. Great price and fast shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Kay

customer_reviews.title: these actually sound really good. Would recommend for a beginner or a seasoned ...
customer_reviews.text: For cheap cymbals, these actually sound really good. Would recommend for a beginner or a seasoned player looking for a bright sound
customer_reviews.author: Scott Spahr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good beginner level cymbals. Perfect for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Sloane

customer_reviews.title: Good sound
customer_reviews.text: These are a good starter set. The sound is good for being brass cymbols. I would recommend these if you are looking for something in expensive and good quality. Took awhile to get them but worth the wait.
customer_reviews.author: Jim E

customer_reviews.title: Sabian 3 pack cymbals. Delivered on time, packed perfectly, no problems
customer_reviews.text: The Sabian cymbals sound great. They look good too. Hi-hats are crisp, and the ride is nice. The crash is ok. I would recommend this product/
customer_reviews.author: Philip L.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: really nice. love the ride, the crash is really good and the hihat is not bad at all
customer_reviews.author: Milena Figueroa Leal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price and great quality. I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gorgiapeach

customer_reviews.title: Good starter. Love the Crash.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good starter cymbal pack. Overall not too bad. The high hat is very bright and resonant. Ride is ok. Not the worst ride, I've seen a lot of more expensive rides that are worse, but this one does better than most $150 rides I've come across. I'm in love with the crash. It's medium to bright, doesn't hang to long, and is nice and crisp, while the other's from this set I've long since replaced, I still keep the crash as part of my setup.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Brown

customer_reviews.title: Quality sound, Awesome price.
customer_reviews.text: Sabina sbr cymbal set has a great price with Amazon, an awesome sound, a wise investment.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey Dotson Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Strong material it may last for a long time well maybe.
customer_reviews.author: weirded99

customer_reviews.title: Love the SBR's. ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Love the SBR's. Great for beginner or the pro that wants a nice clean crisp sound...
customer_reviews.author: C.M. Chrisman

customer_reviews.title: nice!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for my husband for his birthday, he was very happy with the cymbals. Definetely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: mary williams

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: These cymbals sound incredibly like Zildjians. (Of course, the founder of Sabian was a member of the Zildjian family!) You cannot go wrong for the price. I bought them to complement the new Ludwig trap-set I ordered from Amazon, and am absolutely thrilled with their quality, sound, responsiveness, timbre, etc. A terrific purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny-Hawaii

customer_reviews.title: I am very imPressed
customer_reviews.text: I needed new cymbals for my drum set and these ones are awesome theyve got great sound and didn't cost too much. These are great cymbals
customer_reviews.author: Samh

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: My son received these as a Christmas gift and was excited about the upgrade. The quality and sound are great. I think the price was reasonable for the quality. Sabian makes a good cymbal.
customer_reviews.author: Diana L. Trim

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound and quality
customer_reviews.text: Its a beginner level set not even close to HHX I just bought HHX evolutions
customer_reviews.author: zipporah

customer_reviews.title: Good quality item
customer_reviews.text: Good quality item. The quality was much better than what I expected since the price was so reasonable. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Thoreson

customer_reviews.title: Great cymbals for a great price
customer_reviews.text: We had been pricing these same and comparable cymbals from music stores. Great price and very nice sound. Daughter loves them.
customer_reviews.author: KEVIN GASPAROTTO

customer_reviews.title: sbr
customer_reviews.text: Got it fast! I must say this, the ride is excellent! The hi hat is good but be prepared to shop for another crash cymbal because this crash cymbal sucks!! Overall, good buy for the ride and hi hat.....expecially the RIDE!!
customer_reviews.author: diezelish

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I didn't need a premium set of cymbals to play around with, and these fit the bill just fine. Ride is a typical ride cymbal, high hats have a quality hiss to them. Crash is a little heavier than most players probably would enjoy, but I don't care. These are just what I needed at a price I couldn't turn down.
customer_reviews.author: Smart Shopper

customer_reviews.title: A gift
customer_reviews.text: seem okay, packaged bad, box way to big and was open when I got it. But the UPS driver opened it with me to make sure there was no damage. I don't know a lot about them because they are a gift, but seem to be okay.
customer_reviews.author: Karen S.

customer_reviews.title: These sound amazing. I was a bit nervous because I am ...
customer_reviews.text: These sound amazing. I was a bit nervous because I am the type of person that feels a little hesitant after I make a big purchase. But not for these cymbals. They look great and sound great. I am very happy with these! I would recommend these to all my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Love these cymbals!
customer_reviews.text: Just got my cymbals in last week and I've been enjoying them since! For me, this was quite the upgrade from the generic cymbals that came with my set so in my opinion they sound amazing! They are honestly a great deal for what they are, great sound for a mid grade cymbal and they fit into the budget as well! Overall, sweet deal!!!
customer_reviews.author: Drummerdude

customer_reviews.title: Paps & GiGi rock
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is 3. We gave him cymbals, per his parents request, for Christmas! He is already an amazing drummer. Ordering and shipping were perfect. They live 1000 miles away, so that aspect was extremely important!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Sabian SBR performance set
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with the performance of my Sabian SBR cymbals that I recently bought through Amazon. They have great clarity and sound. Couldn't be more satisfied! They look great and sound great! I would definitely recommend this package to anyone interested.........the price was right, too!
customer_reviews.author: Paula C.

customer_reviews.title: Got it
customer_reviews.text: Gift for grandson! May the drums sound out!! Hope he is surprised! Cant wait to here him play and get the effect!
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Sounding
customer_reviews.text: Cheap sounding, but works well enough for a budget set of cymbals. I would save your money for a better set unless you can only afford a cheap set of cymbals.
customer_reviews.author: Benjahmon

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, from what I understand these are made ...
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, from what I understand these are made by zyldjian and it shows.Can not go wrong for the price
customer_reviews.author: Henry L.

customer_reviews.title: sabian low priced cymbals
customer_reviews.text: absolutely flat sounding garbage even for a beginning drummer. save your money and purchase ONE good ride cymbal for this price: even a used one but listen to the sound before you buy. I am not a salesman but, buy from your local music store - in person.
customer_reviews.author: Cordelia Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: I am not pissed off.
customer_reviews.text: Good cheap cymbals...I am pleased. You don't want to piss me off.
customer_reviews.author: seth cowan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: shipping was faster then 2 days , they are ok
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Reyes

customer_reviews.title: but not very good quality. Decent for beginners
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. They are serviceable, but not very good quality. Decent for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Freeburg

customer_reviews.title: great company but these are more for looks than for ...
customer_reviews.text: Ok they are Sabian,great company but these are more for looks than for sound quality, live and learn. Buy zildjian and grow.
customer_reviews.author: Paul bittner

customer_reviews.title: Five Star
customer_reviews.text: Crisp and clean! I really like the sound I get out of these cymbals!
customer_reviews.author: Caral Rex Kingery Jr.

product_meta.title: Sabian SBR Performance Pack with 14-Inch Hat, 16-Inch Crash, and 20-Inch Ride Cymbals
product_meta.description: Color:BrassPure brass cymbals with a great look and sound. Your very first step into cymbals is a big one. But SBr makes it easy. With its hammered and lathed surface and tightly focused sounds of pure brass, SBr comes at a very nice price. Stamped with the SABIAN logo, the looks and sounds of this series put it in a class of its own. SBr is brass cymbals at their finest. Included in this set: 14" Hi Hats, 16" Crash, 20" Ride
feature_bullets: Pure Brass Performance Set is sonically matched by SABIAN Artisans
Smartly priced, SBr Brass is in a class of its own
SBr makes your first step into cymbals an easy one

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars128 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
